title: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
tags: curriculum of strategy artistry of war
content: ard. They'll then be able to cast the spell an unlimited number of times. The total damage stated in the tooltip is incorrect. This spell deals 2d6+6 Force damage to each of up to six targets, or six times to a single target, for a total of 12d6 + 36, or 48-108 Force damage. Empowered Evocation affects each bolt individually, giving INT-mod x6 extra damage to this spell. With 20 Intelligence, this spell deals an additional 30 damage, for a total of 78-138 Force damage.
